text: yaad karo (ai nabee), jabaki tum us vyakti se kah rahe the jisapar allaah ne anukampa kee, aur tumane bhee jisapar anukampa kee ki "apanee patnee ko apane paas rok rakho aur allaah ka dar rakho, aur tum apane jee mein us baat ko chhipa rahe ho jisako allaah prakat karanevaala hai. tum logon se darate ho, jabaki allaah isaka zyaada haq rakhata hai ki tum usase daro." atah jab zaid usase apanee zaroorat pooree kar chuka to hamane usaka tumase vivaah kar diya, taaki eemaanavaalon par apane munh bole beton kee patniyon ke maamale mein koee tangee na rahe jabaki ve unase apanee zaroorat pooree kar len. allaah ka faisala to poora hokar hee rahata hai
